scale(.9,1.1)}}html{font-size:16px;font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif}*{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;margin:0;list-style:none}body{background:linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,.18),rgba(0,0,0,.18)),url(/d2d67c3e18a2f94fde94e2cea40c3bbb.jpg) no-repeat 50% fixed;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover}header{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.49)}header h1{font-size:6rem;color:rgba(226,221,221,.89)}header h4{font-size:1.5rem;padding-bottom:1vh}aside{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.49);position:sticky;top:0;float:left;height:100%;width:25vw}aside h2{padding:.5vw 0;margin:0 1vw;font-size:1.7rem;text-align:center;border-bottom:.3vw double rgba(226,221,221,.89)}aside ul{list-style:none}aside ul li{padding:2vw;margin:1vw;font-size:1.1rem;color:rgba(226,221,221,.89);background-color:rgba(211,80,32,.562);border-radius:10%;text-align:center;transition:transform .4s}aside ul li:hover{background-color:rgba(220,20,60,.34);cursor:pointer;transform:scale(1.04)}main{min-height:100vh;width:70vw;margin:.5vh 2vw 0 auto}.boxes{justify-content:center;align-content:center;display:grid;padding:2vw;grid-gap:1vw;grid-auto-rows:minmax(8vw,150px);grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,300px);transition:transform 1s}.boxes .card{background-color:rgba(46,58,86,.7);border-radius:10px;box-shadow:2px 2px 4px #333;transition:transform .5s}.boxes .card a{font-size:1.5rem;text-transform:capitalize}.boxes .card:hover{background-color:rgba(220,20,60,.34);cursor:pointer}.boxes .card:active{transform:scale(1.04)}.modalMainContainer{display:none;position:fixed;z-index:10;left:0;top:0;height:100%;width:100%;overflow:auto;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);color:#000}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer{background-color:#f4f4f4;margin:20% auto;width:70%;box-shadow:0 5px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2),0 7px 20px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.17);animation-name:modalOpen;animation-duration:1s}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalHeader{padding:1vw;background-color:#5580aa;color:#f4f4f4;font-size:2.3rem;text-align:center}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalBody{color:#2e3a56;padding:4vw;font-size:1.5rem;color:rgba(22,22,22,.9);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalBody input{display:none;height:12vh;width:100%;font-size:3.5rem;background-color:#c8ccd1}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalBody input::placeholder{color:#a2a9b1}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalBodyImage{width:90%;padding:2vw;display:none}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalFooter{background-color:#5580aa;color:#f4f4f4;font-size:1.2rem;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;padding:2vw}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalButton{display:none;cursor:pointer;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.856);border-radius:5%;padding:1vw 1.5vw;color:#f4f4f4;font-size:1rem;outline:none;box-shadow:2px 2px 3px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.507);transition:.3s}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .modalButton:hover{transform:scale(1.04);background-color:#000}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .closeBtn{float:right;font-size:2rem;color:rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .closeBtn:focus,.modalMainContainer .modalContentContainer .closeBtn:hover{color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);cursor:pointer;text-decoration:none}@keyframes modalOpen{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@media only screen and (max-device-width:938px){header h1{font-size:4rem}header h4{font-size:1.2rem;padding-bottom:3vh}}@media only screen and (max-device-width:874px){aside{width:16rem}aside h2{text-align:center;padding:.5rem 0;margin:0 3rem}}@media only screen and input{height:3rem;font-size:2rem}}@media only screen and (max-device-width:684px){.boxes{padding:2vh 0;grid-gap:3vw;grid-auto-rows:minmax(8vw,150px);grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,1fr)}.boxes a{font-size:1.3rem}}@media only screen and (max-device-width:474px){header h1{font-size:2.3rem}header h4{font-size:1.1rem;padding-bottom:1vh}}
